A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A great concept with unexpected turns that for the most part satisfy the viewers but some unnecessary\, out of place and stupid moments hold the film for surpassing its predecessor. It’s mixed positive and negative components relate it to the best prequel movie\, ‘Revenge of the Sith’. A great build up from The Force Awakens was mostly squandered from Luke’s first action to several revelations that simply make fun of and insult fans.
